Package com.example.mborper.breathbetter.bluetooth

Class Utilities

java.lang.Object
com.example.mborper.breathbetter.bluetooth.Utilities
public class Utilities extends Object
The Utilities class provides a set of utility functions to handle string and byte conversions, including operations on UUIDs, byte arrays, and hexadecimal representations.
Author:
Jordi Bataller i Mascarell

      Natural:masSignificativos ---> dosLongToBytes() ---> [byte] Natural:menosSignificativos

      Parameters:
      masSignificativos - The most significant bits.
      menosSignificativos - The least significant bits.
      Returns:
      A byte array representing the two long values.

    • bytesToIntOK

      public static int bytesToIntOK(byte[] bytes)
      Converts a byte array to an integer using safe checks.

      [bytes] ---> bytesToIntOK() ---> Natural

      Parameters:
      bytes - The byte array to convert.
      Returns:
      The integer representation of the byte array.
      Throws:
      Error - if the byte array is longer than 4 bytes.

    • stringToUUID

      public static UUID stringToUUID(String uuid)
      Converts a 16-character string into a UUID.

      Texto:uuid ---> stringToUUID ---> [Caracteres]:UUID

      Parameters:
      uuid - The string to convert to a UUID.
      Returns:
      A UUID generated from the input string.
      Throws:
      Error - if the string is not 16 characters long.
